sentences.sContent: This system traps the gasoline vapor escaping from the fuel tank and carburetor .
sentences.sContent_eng: This system traps the gasoline vapor escaping from the fuel tank and carburetor .
sentences.sCn: 这个系统能收集从燃油箱和化油器泄漏出来的汽油蒸气。

sentences.sContent: The phenomenon of vapor explosions threatens the safe storage and transportation of liquefied petroleum gas.
sentences.sContent_eng: The phenomenon of vapor explosions threatens the safe storage and transportation of liquefied petroleum gas.
sentences.sCn: 液化石油气蒸汽爆炸是对其安全储运构成很大威胁的一种观象。

sentences.sContent: And so, you make not only water vapor, NOX but you make some nitrous oxides, NOX, or nox as it is known, and this is the precursor to smog.
sentences.sContent_eng: And so, you make not only water vapor, NOX but you make some nitrous oxides, NOX, or nox as it is known, and this is the precursor to smog.
sentences.sCn: 这样不仅仅得到的水蒸气，但是你会得到一些氮氧化物，或者如大家所知到的nox，这是烟雾的前驱体。

phrases.pCn: 化学气相沉积；化学汽相淀积
饱和蒸气压；饱和蒸汽压；饱和水蒸汽压

remMethod.val: “外喷” → 蒸气向外喷 → 蒸气

words.tran: 空想的；多蒸气的；雾状的
似蒸气的；模糊的；忧郁病的
